column9: Great place to drop by to have a quick hot dog. Great assortment and good side orders available (such as sourcraut which is a must). Correct and fast service.
Cool place with awesome wieners, including some of their own variants. Goes perfect with a serving of half mashpotatoes half coleslaw.
What happens when you let hipsters run a cool concept? Bad and unfriendly service, and very high prices for a sausage for gods sake!!
If you are a sausages you must visit this place, both eat here and take some special sausages home. It is a party for your soul.And the service is perfect. Visit it.Give it a chance!
